item.title: Developing an Annotated Bibliography
item.description: Your annotated bibliography will help you organize and synthesize your sources in preparation for the literature review in your paper.

item.title: How to Access Course Website Locally
item.description: In case the course website is inaccessible, you can host the site locally on your computer with these steps.

item.title: Summer Preparation
item.description: To reduce the workload during the school year, please consider completing the recommended AP Research summer preparation.
